summary: Adds two new inns in Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds two new inns in Skyrim. Karthwasten Hall in Karthwasten has turned into a inn where your able to get food and rest. And also a building is added in Shor's Stone called the Goatrock Inn. And this mod also allows you to rent a bed in the The Drunken Huntsman inn in Whiterun and the New Gnisis Cornerclub in Widhelm. With this mod your able to find a inn in every city and town in Skyrim. It also allows you to sleep for free at the Helgen Homestead inn in Helgen. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1018?]here[/url]. Also if you have Dragonborn check out my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76042/?]Tel Mithryn Food And Bed[/url] mod. Also if you have Oblivion check out my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/40058/?]Oblivion More Rentable Inns[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
